ygData.subject: RE: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: I play Both Shaman and Druid in game and the Shamans spells are a bit more powerful but druids get snare, that gives them a major edge in kiting. Though
ygData.messageBody:
I play Both Shaman and Druid in game and the Shamans spells are a bit more
powerful but druids get snare, that gives them a major edge in kiting.
Though neither of these is the king of kiting actually, it's a Necro. Even
better is a Necro with Jboots and SoW or even a Necro teamed with a Druid.
At 12 I can do 250 Damage in a min with 2 spells stack 2 others and life tap
and it comes to about 300 a min at 12 then rising to 450 at 16 for just 3
spells. The big "IF" is if your darkness spell is resisted.


Xakthan
Lord of Shadows
Follower of the Crimson Knights

<--- Enigma --->
http://members.door.net/enigma

-----Original Message-----
From: Brett P Gillmore [mailto:bgillmor@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 11:48 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting



I play a lvl 30 druid and I know that my dots don't even compare to the
Shamans,
well maybe now they do since they toned them down. For example My sting
swarm at
19lvl does like 100, Creeping crude(24lvl) around 180, and immote(29lvl) is
around 250 with a -15 ac adj. Druids do make great kiters up to lvl 34ish,
but
after that its dung. time and we suck in dung's. Most of our spells are
outdoor
only, and we don't heal or nuke as good as cleric's or wizards do. We're
alot
like a bard in someways, more versatile but not good in any one thing.
